abstract: Gunmen kill high profile Kurdish lawyer Tahir Elci after news conference in volatile southeastern Turkey; attorney had been receiving death threats from Turkish nationalists after being arrested on charges of spreading terrorist propaganda for asserting Kurdish Workers Party was not terrorist group.
lead_paragraph: Tahir Elci, an outspoken human rights lawyer, and a police officer were killed by gunmen after he spoke at a news conference in Turkey’s Sur District.

headline.main: Prominent Kurdish Lawyer Is Killed in Southeast Turkey
headline.print_headline: Prominent Kurdish Lawyer Is Killed in Southeast Turkey

snippet: Tahir Elci, an outspoken human rights lawyer, and a police officer were killed by gunmen after he spoke at a news conference in Turkey’s Sur District.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
